website_summaries.verdict: Outpaces competitors for its picture quality, rich sound, and reliable intuitiveness – hands down the best TV in its price range and class.
pros: Offers state-of-the-art viewing technology for less than $1000
Has 4K UHD with 2160p, 120Hz, and curved screen that delivers incredibly life-like images
SmartHub operating system streams fast and stays connected, and step-by-step instructions make setup easy
cons: Only 3 HDMI inputs compared to 4 that several others in its category offer
A bit pricey for a 43-inch model

customer_reviews.title: The remote is fantastic, it simply knows what is connected to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV for a week, and its stunning. I've found myself staring at the screen when streaming 4k content from YouTube. The remote is fantastic, it simply knows what is connected to the TV, and controls it...all of it. I can't speak to the sound, because I run my audio through a 5.1 channel system. The apps work really well (Netflix, HBO Now, YouTube, Amazon Video, etc). Its a set worth hanging on a wall where all can see it. Simply beautiful picture for the average viewer. If you're a TV snob, I can't help you. For the other 99% of us, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as a monitor for coding. I'm using it as a 60Hz 4K monitor, driven from a MB Pro mid-2015. I used the following products to make this happen: I also had to use the SwitchResX software in order to add a custom config for 60Hz at the 4K resolution (default configs for this TV only use 30Hz but it can easily show 60Hz)
customer_reviews.author: AU

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice TV.  Couldnt like it better.
customer_reviews.text: I use this TV as my monitor for my mini-super computer setup. I love it. the curved screen makes viewing really nice. I sit within 3 feet of the screen... and it is easy to use with my CAD system. I really like this product. Though... make sure you get a good GPU as this will be the slowdown for your CAD projects. 65 inches is defiantly not too big for a monitor. It really makes CAD work pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Leslieallen

customer_reviews.title: We all know Samsung tv are the best ever made
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung tv is the bomb baby. I had a vizio 3D tv that I wouldn’t never let go. But my boyfriend trying to convince me 3D is played out lol. Even tho I still miss my 3D tv. We all know Samsung tv are the best ever made. Then it’s curvy like myself😜. so yes I love this tv way to much now. The 4K is nice but remember u have to have things in 4K to see the quality of real 4K.
customer_reviews.author: SexierThanLife

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and upscaling
customer_reviews.text: Took us awhile to get used to the HD characters in our living room - realistic! The upscaling on old shows and movies is great. We popped in a DVD of the classic black and white 'A Christmas Story', and the the HD upscaling made it feel like we were there on set! After a couple of years, the picture and TV are still great. Settings, smart hub, etc. are seamless and intuitive. The one complaint is that this TV easily forgets its network settings - I'm constantly having to re-enter my wireless settings. Can't seem to get resolution from Samsung on it either.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: The Worst Purchase of my life!
customer_reviews.text: One the worst purchase of my life, the the LED panel went dead within 14 months of purchase, the cost to repair is more than the cost of a new TV. According to Samsung technician, it was a luck of draw, and Samsung response was very discouraging, asked me to to just dump it and buy a new one. Sure I will do that, but never again a Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Nilanjna Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV and Great for Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV for 4K gaming with PS4. Note that only 1 HDMI slot out of the 3 support HDR. Beautiful picture and perfect size for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the way this unhappy story was handled by ...
customer_reviews.text: This replacement TV works very well. I want to commend Amazon for their handling of the problem of a faulty TV. Tech support was marvelous. The worker struggled with the cranky TV for several hours and suggested a replacement. I am very pleased with the way this unhappy story was handled by Amazon. My new TV arrived on Tuesday and is running happily. Lorraine Komor
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M. Komor

customer_reviews.title: Don't mix up the 2 sets of screws that come ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't mix up the 2 sets of screws that come with this, because they are not different in the user manual but make a difference in the sturdiness of the base.
customer_reviews.author: Mao Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. Love the picture and the curve but really like the SMART applications. This TV recognizes all my input devices and I only need one remote (the Samsung remote) to control all of my devices. Some people have complained about the privacy implications of the apps but I really don't care who knows what I watch.....the ease of use and setup exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: jpogar

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months the screen developed a black streak about a foot wide from top to bottom just off of center. I am now in the arduous process of dealing with repair people which has been cumbersome in itself. I'm told the whole screen will have to be replaced! I asked Samsung to replace the TV and was told that is not an option. Totally sucks! :(
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D.

customer_reviews.title: Product Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Paid almost $1400 for this TV, and just over 3yrs old the picture has gone out. NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER of Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixals First Year
customer_reviews.text: Hung on a wall in a climate controlled room, used less than 100 hours and has a huge line of pixels going out. Absolute crap.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.P.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful features and great picture
customer_reviews.text: this TV is something else, beautiful features and great picture, worth the money... all this is true but I bought it in 2017 for $1,099 and now it's over $1,450 I wonder why it went up so much in 2019, supposed to go down and not up.....
customer_reviews.author: doodi20

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great picture most of the time. Some difficulty with sun and lamp reflections.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: nice but go bigger it's all screen
customer_reviews.text: Looks great maybe should have gotten the 49 inch there's no edges so bigger one would have been ok tv bezels are much smaller than the old days so should have gotten the larger one
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: 100% A Great TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is just as great as my family and I had imagined! The set up was easy from start to finish. Enjoying the quality of the picture no matter what lighting the TV is in by the way. This curve TV has just enough curve to the screen. This TV is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great definition. Many features
customer_reviews.text: Very neat and solid display of images and colors, great definition. Many features, very smart TV indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R Morales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is incredible. Great picture, looks sharp in your house. The stand is pretty big I would recommend wall mounting. If you have an older HDTV this one will blow it clear out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself 400 dlls
customer_reviews.text: I like the TV but not sure if it's worth it to pay 400 dlls more for a curve TV, if you are like me that only wants a nice TV to watch sports and movies save yourself 400 dlls and buy the flat screen version. I don't see a big difference between one and another
customer_reviews.author: Raoul

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Picture color is vivid and clear
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Picture color is vivid and clear. You will need to tweak the settings to get the best picture, but its worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGirl!

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great. You can use the remote control for everything
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great.You can use the remote control for everything.The curve is great too you can watch it from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus  D. Escalante

customer_reviews.title: This is way better than my 4K tv from last year and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than my 4K tv from last year and it's so thin. Picture quality is so amazing. I bought this tv for my 18 wheeler sleeper. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great with my computer
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a large 4K monitor to use with my desktop and notebook for editing video. This Samsung TV works great for that. It would have been absolutely perfect if available in a slightly smaller size such as 40" rather than 43".
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m blind, but my LG smart tv has the same picture quality.:.at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fox0218

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering something like this from amazon. But it was delivered quickly, and on time. This tv is great and a definite upgrade from my 8 year old Samsung I am replacing. Picture is really clear, and the remote, (once you get the hang of it) is small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jason anderson

customer_reviews.title: Serious HDR input limitations. Avoid this TV
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this TV if you want good HDR support. This TV only supports one HDR input (HDMI1). The other inputs do not support HDR video, so if you have an XBox One S and a Playstation 4, you'll have to choose which one gets to be HDR, because it can't be both. Unfortunately, this limitation is not revealed in the specs or anywhere else, but can be found in the on-screen e-manual built into the TV. Because of this limitation, I can't recommend this TV, as it will not serve the ongoing and future needs of anyone who wants HDR content from more than one source.
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Backlight goes out after a year
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until i got a dark area down the center of it.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture as long as you are not to Far on the side view.
customer_reviews.author: Wahoo

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great price
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this television! Great picture, great price.
customer_reviews.author: J Owens

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Had tv 2 years and has a shaded dark streak from top to bottom
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best TV ever
customer_reviews.text: This TV is perfect for me because I can talk to it and it'll change the channel this is simply the best picture I've seen while watching TV it's like a movie theater experience I recommend this TV for everybody especially those for in a wheelchair and who have difficulty changing the channel Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.author: dehncke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All my samsung products have been great including my new UN65KU7500 Curved tv.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV! Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Great TV! Easy set-up. Had to exchange remote for a smart remote but Samsung took care of it quickly. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William J Murray

customer_reviews.title: We are enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: The television is nice. Two things, and neither is really a big deal: 1) The pictorial instructions for setting the tv on its stand threw me for a temporary loop as one piece pictured on the instructions appeared to be missing, but then while trying to figure out where the screws went into the stand, I realized the piece had already been placed onto the larger stand piece. 2) The power cord end that attaches/inserts to the back of the tv seems a bit loose, so I told everyone that if the tv powers off, first thing to check is whether the cord is still connected adequately to the tv.
customer_reviews.author: InOhio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tv. Using this as a PC monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tv. Using this as a PC monitor. Only issue I have is when the PC wakes from sleep the tv won't reconnect. I have to restart pc. My workaround right now is to just keep pc on all the time and use a screensaver. Works fine like that. -1 star as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stoltzfus

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have using this TV for about a month now and it's mind blowing. I have to watch anything in true 4K but it makes everything seem live. You feel like you're watching a live production in person and the sound is great too. If you're looking for a new TV look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Harold F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. Slight glare on screen can be bothersome at times, depending on lighting in room.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: hdmi connections to things like a PS4 are fuzzy and leave a constant flickering ...
customer_reviews.text: hdmi connections to things like a PS4 are fuzzy and leave a constant flickering of white dots. Have tried different applications and different cords so I am fairly certain its the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the TV look and style but it has flaws
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV look and style but it has flaws... I exchange the TV 3 different times and they all had the same problem with LED light bleeding through the top and bottom trim... so you when you were watching a night scene or dark scene in a movie you would see White glow at the top edges... they told me that they were going to discontinue this TV obviously Amazon doesn't care that's why they didn't do me any favors! Luckily Samsung is standing behind their product not complete yet but they said if they can't fix it in a couple more times they would replace it with a whole nother TV...
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: the most important thing you should know is how you doing
customer_reviews.text: I like that the TV has everything you can watch your favorite TV shows has internet it's huge I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Andre ford

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: We love the quality of this display and were shocked and how inexpensive it was. I paid about double for a 3D TV in 2008 but this looks so much better and we never used the 3D features. The curve isn't something you notice for long. Many guests have not even mentioned or noticed. It's nice but not by a wow factor. I like that it is thin and the blacks appear dark. I don't use any of the smart TV functions but would prefer 2-3 more HDMI ports. Buying it from Amazon was so easy. Came home and it was waiting for me. No need to drive to a retail store and try cramming something into your car.
customer_reviews.author: optern15

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this tv I like the slim design
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this tv I like the slim design, the sound is great and the picture quality is excellent. I also like the upscaling feature that upscales normal hd to near 4k, I'm really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great TV,,, Missing Screws.
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV, I'm using it for a computer Monitor. 3 Stars mainly because the 4 Each (M4 X L14) screws were missing from the package so I had to go to the local hardware store but they didn't have 4mm X 14mm long screws so I had to buy 16mm long screws and put 5 washers on it, big bummer. EDIT, bumping up to 5 stars, got over the missing screws, and this is a wonderful replacement for an array of Monitors, as least for this Computer Programmer.
customer_reviews.author: Linux Guy

customer_reviews.title: Viva Ultra HD TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade. Colors are vibrant. I would recommend a sound bar as it adds to the depth. Recommend to turn off the Eco Boast as it is a hindrance to view HD colors in a darken room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: Super picture and sound, the smart remote control is simple and amazing. The Samsung TVs are without a doubt the most reliable and longest lasting brand. This is our third one, the other two are still working great after 10 and 8 years of heavy service. We wanted to go with an updated Smart TV. WE love it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal picture. Easy to set up. Excellent from all viewing angles.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Ghrist

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Everything they say about it is TRUE. A fantastic product if it holds up. Many great features. Remote innovative but difficult to use. Is not as handy as a normal remote at this point (has no numbers on remote) but that may change with time and familiarity. Believe the comments that the Owners Manual (on-line) and other Documentation is HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B. Mallernee

customer_reviews.title: Awsome TV
customer_reviews.text: Love it at first curved was weird kinda now i don't e even notice.
customer_reviews.author: stkies59

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tv is just amazing ,is good over all aspects
customer_reviews.author: Adonis

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great software
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to a 43 inch tv and purchased a cheaper model. It regularly took over a minute to turn on, changing stations was awkward and the picture was mediocre. I saw this one for a good price and ordered it; very significant improvement. I don't have the 4k cable plugged in so it is normal HD, still, the picture is exceptional, the curve and skinny design is slick.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tv I have ever purchased! Flawless picture
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Superb picture quality. You get what you pay for with this tv!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV. The only complain was that somehow the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. The only complain was that somehow the manufacturer default was set to Spanish as a display language so I could not go thru the initial set up. I called Samsung Tech Support without resolution. However, after a couple of hours the language was changed back to English (by itself?) so I finished the set up in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: winsmo

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K TV for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations!!!!! Make sure the TV is properly configured to really enjoy the level of sharpness and colorful the unit provides. Cant wait to get the 60" SUHD curved for the living room. We already own the 55" curved 240hz which also delivers a great image but... men love new toys!
customer_reviews.author: Celestron

customer_reviews.title: Really is fine the colors are great the sound is perfect but ...
customer_reviews.text: Really is fine the colors are great the sound is perfect but I arrived with the broken contro, to be a new product and samsung I do not think it's much joy to receive it in that way with a broken control, but everything else was good
customer_reviews.author: Reydis

customer_reviews.title: While the instructions are horrible, both the assembly quick guide and the manual
customer_reviews.text: While the instructions are horrible, both the assembly quick guide and the manual, the tv is great...even shades of black come out nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The picture clear and the sound very good sharp it is amazing I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amun Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time. Delivered t the location of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Delivered t the location of my choice inside the house. The TV was checked by the folks who delivered it to see if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv. Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice tv. Great picture. But make sure u have high speed internet or u won't get what u want for picture quality. 4k is still a little advanced at this time.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: So Sad!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad! The TV arrived on time and in perfect condition. Our gorgeous TV arrived and had a loose electrical connection. The TV kept cutting on and off. When I was starting to set it up it would not connect.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of the curve experience. It was a bit disorienting at first, but once you get used to it, it's amazing. The TV also says it has low input lag. I can definitely vouch for this with ps4 and Xbox one. My experience with this tv has been awesome. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love this tv
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I love this tv, the remote is great, it's so smart don't need my xfinity remote. I cannot get over the great picture and sound. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: bad experience  don't buy
customer_reviews.text: (garbage tv )The seller is not honorable Beware of this crook . Curse

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. AWESOME Picture, Color AND Terrific Sound. Of course, it's still fairly new, so we'll see in the near future if I am stash excited.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung UN65KU7500 Curved 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD
customer_reviews.text: The image is very clear and bright. It is amazing. I am glad that I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: other than that its amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had to use an adapter to get minidisplayport to hdmi working at 60hz, other than that its amazing!

customer_reviews.title: strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Picture is so much better than our previous HD TV.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, accomodated my PS4, DVR, apps seamlessly. I like the curved screen. Didn't know if I would but my kids wanted it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I want to buy like 2 more..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning picture quality and range of color I had previously ...
customer_reviews.text: Stunning picture quality and range of color I had previously not thought possible. This TV displays reds, blacks, and greens in ways that I haven't seen anywhere else, on or off screen!
customer_reviews.author: 5t3v3n

customer_reviews.title: 4K is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV! Great price! 4K is unbelievable. Cable could be better but that's the cable boxes fault, not the TV
customer_reviews.author: pope66682

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV! The picture is excellent and the sound from the TV alone is very good
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Schomacker

customer_reviews.title: Slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: I gave this tv two stars because it has two small scratches on the screen, the scratches are not visible when the tv is turned on. I was going to return this tv for another reason, but I changed my mind and decided to keep it. Other than the slight damage it's a very nice tv. I hope that the scratches don't expand, because I asked my husband to take the box that it came in to the basement (I always keep the packing box for at least 3-6 months) he put it in the trash instead. So I guest I'll be keeping this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV and love the curve. We are buying more of these for our other rooms. Great quality TV. We have used several other Samsung's in the past and seem to be the best TV for our family. My brother has about 14 Samsung TV's around his pool table in the man cave and around bar and he has found that they are the best quality for the price. Our new curved TV is in our bedroom. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV. The big difference than my curved 55 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. The big difference than my curved 55 in Samsung TV is the sound quality. The speakers are big and decent enough on the 65 in so one do not need an external sound system. My living room is about 24x24 ft. It made a big viewing difference between the Samsung curved 55" to a curved Samsung 65" TV. My Samsung TVs outperform my Sony, LG and Visio TVs. In my opinion Samsung clarity, sharpness, quality, and reliability surpasses any other brand. However, I do not like the 2016 Samsung remote controls. A simple wrong touch will turn the TV off. I like the 2015 remote control model better.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia T.

customer_reviews.title: From no guru but love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that I am not a TV guru. I like to watch it every so often and love a clear picture. THIS TV IS GREAT! Very much a 3D feel. My kids turned on Netflix and I was amazed. So I turned on a regular channel (HD) and it was just as good. You really see that 3rd dimension. That's the only way I can describe it.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: when you think the picture can't get any better..
customer_reviews.text: when you think the picture can't get any better....Just had Direct TV upgrade my system to 4K...OMG....like the players were right there...the shows even crisper and cleaner in color.....amazing ...Great TV...Never had problems with Samsung Televisions.
customer_reviews.author: AMarini

customer_reviews.title: Samsung TVs.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So I'm buying another Samsung. Now I'm getting the UN65KU9800. I don't know the different but it cost a lot more so I bought it! Only kidding. My UN65KU9800 arrives Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. The picture is just so so and the various sound hookups don't always work. The picture has a glare depending on the angle you look at it. Sometimes the tv is not very smart. It doesn't always know the receiver is on and you have to manually set it. Other times it doesn't know the built-in speaker is needed and I can't manually set it. Also, the digital output doesn't always work. If I had to buy it again, I wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but...
customer_reviews.text: Great picture but... I guess I didn't understand this whole app thing. If you want NFL Sunday Ticket you can't just subscribe and install an app; you still have to buy a Roku or something to get the games on your TV. Seems to have a lot of reflected glare, possibly because of the curved screen. I really have to close all the blinds in my case but that's not the end of the world. The base doesn't swivel - just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this tv for about 3 weeks and now it's not coming on. I am incredibly annoyed because I cant return this giant paper weight now. This is ridiculous that something in a new TV would stop working already.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it but just after I bought it Best Buy had it on sale for $150 less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst TV I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: TV will just stop working every 1-2 weeks for no reason, and it will take you about 3-5 hours total to get it to turn on again. Also, the HDMI ports reset all the time so you have to reprogram all your devices. It's unbelievable that such an unreliable TV hasn't been recalled. If you don't believe me, just google "Blinking red light, Samsung TV won't turn on" and you'll see the pages full of people who have had problems with Samsungs over the years. I'll never buy a Samsung TV ever again. That's for certain after this experience. This is not a SMART TV.
customer_reviews.author: Emery Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I love every part of it
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous TV. I love every part of it. The curve adds depth and makes you feel like you can touch the stuff on the screen. Watching Netflix on this thing is a joke. So pretty. Small amount of lag on certain fast moving objects that fly across the screen (football, golf) but its so tough to tell most of the time. 4K is the way to go. But have to buy at least the 7000 series. Anything lower and its not really 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be happy to use this until tv technology can provide 120Hz
customer_reviews.text: Blacks are not black enough, but not many other options available. Screen intermittently blacks out completely for 1-30seconds. Bought new HDMI cables with no change. Possible board issue on tv. Is almost too big for second computer monitor but does work well. Will be happy to use this until tv technology can provide 120Hz, pixel lit perfect black levels and possibly computer connections and higher bit rate color. I am able to get true 60Hz UHD 3840x2160p full RGB 8-bit per channel 32-bit color. Wish it didn't have the other issues, maybe Samsung quality is slacking on some products.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois

customer_reviews.title: sound great, plenary of connection points
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp picture, bright, sound great, plenary of connection points. What I found to be a drawback is the highly touted curved screen. The curve causes reflections that are very annoying- ironic- that screen adds hundreds to the price but I had to switch to a cheaper flat screen without the curavature glare ...Too bad, curved screen looks cool!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: garbage tv has bad flash lighting problem which ruins watching anything with a picture with darker corner it is like watching thru prism i now realize why these were a deal of the day
customer_reviews.author: pats fan

customer_reviews.title: Is there a price protection policy?
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed at the price I paid for mine from Amazon. I wish there was a 30 day price protection policy because I paid almost $100 more for mine about 2 weeks ago. The TV itself is great. Clarity is something to behold when HD is being broadcast.
customer_reviews.author: T Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Tv was nice. Some times the picture was really good but ...
customer_reviews.text: Tv was nice. Some times the picture was really good but other times it seemed a little washed out. I especially didn't like watching 4k videos of fish under the water. The water looked like clouds. Overall a good tv but I returned it and purchased an LG Oled tv which is much much better in every way.
customer_reviews.author: stuart g.

customer_reviews.title: INTERNET CANNOT BE PASSWORD PROTECTED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture. Curve doesn't seem beneficial. If anything, it picks up more reflected light from the range of angles of the screen. Easy hookup, but needs at least one more HDMI hub. BIGGEST ISSUE: The Internet icon cannot be blocked. You can take it off the home screen list, but it is always available, and any kid that wants it can find it. This is a serious software issue (for me, at least) that needs to be corrected NOW by Samsung. If Samsung would provide a means to password protect this, I would give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tv the best money I spent on love it great pitcher
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: I got this yesterday, after I set up eveyrthing ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday, after I set up eveyrthing and using it for a 2 hours, it started rebooting nonstop.
customer_reviews.author: Azoon

customer_reviews.title: The silver lining frame around the tv looks very cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: The silver lining frame around the tv looks very cheap. It really makes the tv look cheap in a big living room. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tv! Packaged perfectly. My husband is in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin
